script.name: tv.sepa.cmd.shiptemplateoutfit.dock
script.description: Cmd: Dock outfits ship on template

line.comment: * This script will outfit a ship with wares available at the station. It has the
* ability to do partial fits and will complete the script even without all wares
* available. Equipment and upgrades installed provided there is money, and even
* in this case, will continue to install equipment and upgrades until money runs
* Doing this twice, to ensure cargo install can take all wares
* Installing lasers to match model's configuration.
* Also match missile fire probability with model ship
* Advanced Jump Drive Config, Missile, and Ammo Supply
* $Ship-> begin task $Task with script 'Cmd.OOSLaserSwitch.Run' and priority 10: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
* Matching all selected ships turret commands. Only support normal turret cmds

sval.val: Cmd: Dock outfits ship on template
This script will outfit a ship with wares available at the station. It has the
ability to do partial fits and will complete the script even without all wares
available. Equipment and upgrades installed provided there is money, and even
in this case, will continue to install equipment and upgrades until money runs
Doing this twice, to ensure cargo install can take all wares
Installing lasers to match model's configuration.
Also match missile fire probability with model ship
Advanced Jump Drive Config, Missile, and Ammo Supply
$Ship-> begin task $Task with script 'Cmd.OOSLaserSwitch.Run' and priority 10: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
Matching all selected ships turret commands. Only support normal turret cmds
